column3: Rivet Mudcloth-Inspired Decorative Throw Pillow, 12" x 24", Navy
column7:
This throw pillow's bold color and mudcloth-inspired pattern will give your room a global modern twist. Skillfully sewn, high quality fabric and a plush pillow insert make this a cozy, resilient addition to a sofa or chair.
Mudcloth-inspired patterns create a modern, global style
Sewn in U.S. of durable cotton/polyester blend fabric
Pillow Cover: 74% Cotton,26% Polyester. Insert Shell: 100% Cotton. Stuffing: 100% Polyester
Made in USA and Imported
Removable plush fiber-filled insert included
Pillow cover features hidden bottom zipper
12" x 24"
Spot clean with damp white cloth and allow to air dry
